Method.Implementation: do ##class(%ZEN.Auxiliary.jsonSQLProvider).%WriteJSONFromSQL(,"select ID, ""User""->Login As Login, Text, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CreationDate,103) AS CreationDate, CreationTime FROM Other.Letter ORDER BY CreationDate DESC, CreationTime DESC") quit $$$OK

Method.name: GetCommentsByUser
Method.Description: Get all comments by one user
Method.Implementation: set usr=$ZCONVERT($ZCONVERT(userid ,"I","URL") ,"I","UTF8") do ##class(%ZEN.Auxiliary.jsonSQLProvider).%WriteJSONFromSQL(,"SELECT ID, Text, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CreationDate,103) AS CreationDate, CreationTime FROM Word.Comment WHERE ""User""->Login='"_usr_"' ORDER BY CreationDate DESC, CreationTime DESC") quit $$$OK

Method.name: GetTranslationsByUser
Method.Description: Get all translations by one user
Method.Implementation: set usr=$ZCONVERT($ZCONVERT(userid ,"I","URL") ,"I","UTF8") do ##class(%ZEN.Auxiliary.jsonSQLProvider).%WriteJSONFromSQL(,"SELECT EnglishName, Word.Translation.ID, TranslationContext,TranslationName, TranslationRating, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CreationDate,103) AS CreationDate,CreationTime FROM Word.Translation JOIN Word.Term ON Word.Term.Id=TermId WHERE ""User""->Login='"_usr_"' ORDER BY CreationDate DESC,CreationTime DESC") quit $$$OK
